markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Explorer's Yurt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=365)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 596 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 880 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Before activation, this item appears to be nothing more than a simple rolled-up tent, barely large enough to fit four Medium creatures. Despite attempts to clean it, the tent is perpetually smudged with dirt in various places.

<document level="2" id="action-199" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Explorer's Yurt
